DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine whether reduction serum calcium concentration cinacalcet lead reduction mean blood pressure adjust c-fPWV . The secondary objective study effect calcium reduction 1 ) carotid-radial PWV ( c-rPWV ) , 2 ) common carotid artery ( CCA ) biomechanics , 3 ) pulse wave profile cardiac function .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Cinacalcet Arterial Stiffness Ventricular Function Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: chronic ( > 3 month ) hemodialysis population > 18 year old PTH > 300 ng/L correct Ca > 2.10 mmol/L stable hypertensive drug ( > 1 month ) stable dos phosphate binder dialysis calcium concentration palpable femoral pulse systolic BP 90180 mmHg expect survival > 6 month hemodialysis > 3 year acute infection history myocardial infarction stroke within past 3 month inability consent intolerance cinacalcet inadequate birth control
